body.p:
Santa Fe Bracken County Ky
April 28th 1861
Hon Beriah Magoffin
Governor of Ky

Sir the Present Existing and threatening attitude and Condition the Country is in It is time all true patriots was up and Doing if it is Consistent under the present Circumstances I ask permission of you to raise 100 able bodied men in this vicinity armed and Equiped by the State to hold them in rediness at any Emergency Subject to your Order let me Know forth with

Your Obedient Servt
W. D. Pape
